channel.title: Edge Computing on Developer Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Edge Computing on Developer Portal

item.title: Touchpad Digit Recognition Based on ESP-DL
item.description: This article demonstrates how to implement a touchpad-based digit recognition system using ESP-DL on ESP32 series chips. It covers the complete workflow from data collection and preprocessing to model training, quantization, and deployment, showcasing ESP-DL’s capabilities in edge AI applications.

item.title: ESP32-S3 Edge-AI｜Human Activity Recognition Using Accelerometer Data and ESP-DL
